create procedure update_has_relationships_flag(@sourceitemtypename nvarchar(32),@sourceitemID char(32),@flagpropname nvarchar(32),@relationshiptocheck nvarchar(32)) AS BEGIN DECLARE @relationship_db_name nvarchar(32) DECLARE @sourceitemtype_db_name nvarchar(32)
SET @sourceitemtype_db_name = (select instance_data from [ITEMTYPE] where name = @sourceitemtypename)
SET @relationship_db_name = (select instance_data from [ITEMTYPE] where name = @relationshiptocheck)
DECLARE @SQLstr nvarchar(500) DECLARE @ParmDefinition nvarchar(500); SET @ParmDefinition = N'@id char(32)';
DECLARE @count int SET @SQLstr = N'UPDATE [' + @sourceitemtype_db_name + '] SET ' + @flagpropname + ' = CASE WHEN (select count(id) FROM [' + @relationship_db_name + '] where SOURCE_ID = @id) > 0 THEN ''1'' ELSE ''0'' END WHERE ID=@id';
EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLstr, @ParmDefinition, @id=@sourceitemID
SET @SQLstr = N'SELECT * FROM [' + @sourceitemtype_db_name + '] WHERE ID = @id'
EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLstr, @ParmDefinition, @id=@sourceitemID END
